content.rendered:
Directed by Oran Zegman. Brian Dannelly. Hannah Macpherson. Max Winkler.

Written by Megan Trinrud. Megan Trinrud. Megan Trinrud. Megan Trinrud. Megan Trinrud. Nate Trinrud. Nate Trinrud. Nate Trinrud. Nate Trinrud. Nate Trinrud. Lijah Barasz. Oliver Goldstick. Natalia Castells-Esquivel. Thomas Higgins. Maria Nguyen. Bernadette Luckett.

Cast Milo Manheim (Wally Clark). Spencer Macpherson (Xavier Baxter). Kiara Pichardo (Nicole Herrera). Sarah Yarkin (Rhonda). Nick Pugliese (Charley). Rainbow Wedell (Claire Zolinski). Josh Zuckerman (Mr. Martin). Maria Dizzia (Sandra Nears).Peyton List . Patrick Gilmore (Mr. Anderson). Alison Thornton (Chloe). Vanessa Prasad (Kirsten). RaeAnne Boon (Dawn). Kalyn Miles (Ms. Fields). Jayce Barreiro (Mr. Graziano). Ian Tracey (Sheriff Baxter). Alex Zahara (Principal Hartman). Peter New (Mr. South). Katarina Mueller (Tira). Dylan Floyde (Sheriff’s Deputy). Gavin Langelo (Football Guy). Austin Falk (Lacrosse Player). Brittany Spiteri (Cheerleader #1). Yudy Rodriguez (Cheerleader #2). Brianne Mapson (Cheerleader #4). Hannah Cam (Cheerleader #5). Halle Gall (Cheerleader #6). Carolyn Adair (Study Hall Teacher (uncredited))

Language English.

Producers Donald Petersen. Austin Bedell. Don Dunn. Joyce Sawa. Max Winkler. Oliver Goldstick. Megan Trinrud. Nate Trinrud.

Production Awesomeness Studio. Paramount+.

Creators Megan Trinrud. Nate Trinrud.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 9

Status OnGoing (2023–)
